meanings.definition: The act of making something larger or more extensive.
meanings.sent1: The enlargements of the playground made it more fun for the children.
meanings.sent2: She ordered enlargements of the map to see the details more clearly.
meanings.sent3: The enlargements of the cake were so big, they barely fit in the oven!
meanings.sent4: His dreams were like enlargements of reality, vivid and grand.
meanings.sent5: The enlargements of the garden made it seem like a magical forest.

meanings.definition: A photograph or picture that has been made larger.
meanings.sent1: The enlargements of the family photo were displayed proudly on the wall.
meanings.sent2: She asked for enlargements of the vacation pictures to frame them.
meanings.sent3: The enlargements of the cat photo made its whiskers look enormous!
meanings.sent4: Her smile in the enlargement was as bright as the sun.
meanings.sent5: The enlargement of the landscape photo brought out every detail of the mountains.
